parameters.name: $src_base_tables$
parameters.label: DBConnection_SRC
parameters.customQuery:
WITH current_batch AS (
    SELECT 
        bls.batch_id,
        bls.source_start_cutoff_datetime,
        bls.source_end_cutoff_datetime
    FROM $$operational_schema.batch_load_summary bls
    WHERE bls.source_system_code = '$$sourcesystemcode'
      AND bls.batch_status = 'Inprogress'
      AND bls.batch_id = (
          SELECT MAX(batch_id)
          FROM $$operational_schema.batch_load_summary
          WHERE source_system_code = '$$sourcesystemcode'
            AND batch_status = 'Inprogress'
      )
)
SELECT DISTINCT
prkr.policy_cmm_container AS straight_through_processing_data_staging_type,
prkr.policy_system_id AS policy_source_system_id,
prkr.policy_cmm_container AS row_type,
prkr.policy_number,
prkr.policy_module_number,
prkr.policy_number || '-' || prkr.policy_module_number  as policy_key,
prkr.line_of_business,
bp.parentid as policy_parent_id,
bp.effectivedt AS policy_effective_date,
CASE
WHEN '$$risk_id_flag' = 'Y'
THEN prkr.risk_id 
ELSE 'NULL' END AS risk_id,
CASE
WHEN a1.addr1 IS NOT NULL THEN a1.stateprovcd
WHEN a2.addr1 IS NOT NULL THEN a2.stateprovcd
ELSE 'NULL' END AS risk_state,
insured.indexname AS insured_name,
cust.customer_number,
t.transactioncd AS transaction_code,
CAST(cast(t.transactiondt AS varchar) + ' ' + t.transactiontm AS datetime) as transaction_datetime,
u.typecd as user_type_cd,
cb.batch_id as batch_id
FROM $$dbo_schema.transactionhistory_stg t
JOIN $$dbo_schema.userinfo_stg u
ON t.transactionuser = u.loginid
JOIN $$dbo_schema.policy_risk_key_reference prkr
ON t.systemid = prkr.policy_system_id
AND t.cmmcontainer = prkr.policy_cmm_container
JOIN $$dbo_schema.basicpolicy_stg bp
ON t.systemid = bp.systemid
AND t.cmmcontainer = bp.cmmcontainer
AND prkr.policy_system_id = bp.systemid
AND prkr.policy_cmm_container = bp.cmmcontainer
AND prkr.policy_reference_id = bp.id
LEFT JOIN $$dbo_schema.insured_stg insured
ON prkr.policy_system_id = insured.systemid
AND prkr.policy_cmm_container = insured.cmmcontainer
LEFT JOIN $$dbo_schema.policy_stg p
ON prkr.policy_system_id = p.systemid
AND prkr.policy_cmm_container = p.cmmcontainer
LEFT JOIN $$dbo_schema.customer_stg cust
ON p.customerref = cust.system_id
INNER JOIN $$dbo_schema.building_stg b
ON prkr.risk_system_id = b.systemid
ANd prkr.policy_cmm_container = b.cmmcontainer
AND prkr.risk_id = b.parentid
INNER JOIN $$dbo_schema.risk_stg r
ON prkr.risk_system_id = r.systemid
AND prkr.policy_cmm_container = r.cmmcontainer
AND prkr.risk_id = r.id
LEFT JOIN $$dbo_schema.addr_stg a1
ON b.systemid = a1.systemid
AND b.cmmcontainer = a1.cmmcontainer
AND b.id = a1.parentid
AND a1.addrtypecd = 'RiskAddr'
AND a1.addr1 IS NOT NULL
AND a1.stateprovcd IN $$state_list
LEFT JOIN $$dbo_schema.addr_stg a2
ON r.systemid = a2.systemid
AND r.cmmcontainer = a2.cmmcontainer
AND r.locationref = a2.parentid
AND a2.addrtypecd = 'LocationAddr'
AND a2.addr1 IS NOT NULL
AND a2.stateprovcd IN $$state_list
CROSS JOIN current_batch cb
WHERE t.cmmcontainer = 'Policy'
AND t.transactioncd = 'New Business'
and t.bookdt >= dateadd(day, -1, $LastRunTime)
AND u.typecd IN ('Company','Producer')
AND bp.cmmcontainer = 'Policy'
AND prkr.policy_cmm_container = 'Policy'
AND prkr.policy_risk_key_reference_row_effective_end_date = '9999-12-31 00:00:00.000000'
ORDER BY 
prkr.policy_cmm_container,    
prkr.policy_system_id,
bp.parentid,
prkr.risk_id;

parameters.name: $src_data_source_query$
parameters.label: DBConnection_SRC
parameters.customQuery:
select
distinct 'Betterview' as straight_through_processing_data_staging_source_system,
 'Straight Through Processing' as straight_through_processing_data_staging_domain,
null as cmm_container,
 'property' as originating_source_name,
 'NULL' as originating_load_type,
 'Loaded' as straight_through_processing_data_staging_load_state,
cast(bvp.property_version_id as varchar) as straight_through_processing_data_staging_row_source_system_key,
null as system_id,
null as parent_id,
null as policy_risk_id,
bvp.property_risk_id,
 'dbo' as source_schema_name,
 'betterview_property_stg' as source_table_name,
 'property_status' as source_field_name,
bvp.property_status as source_value
from
(
select
distinct p.property_version_id as property_version_id,
p.property_version_number as property_version_number,
p.property_street as property_street,
p.property_city as property_city,
p.property_state as property_state,
p.property_zip as property_zip,
p.external_id as property_risk_id,
p.order_date as property_order_date_of_betterview_risk_data_pull,
p.completion_date as property_completion_date_of_ordered_betterview_risk_data_pull,
p.update_date as property_update_date,
p.latest_image_capture_date as property_latest_image_capture_date,
p.overall_visual_score as property_roof_spotlight_index,
p.property_status as property_status,
pb.property_version_id as building_property_version_id,
pb.property_building_id as building_property_building_id,
pb.building_number as building_number,
pb.property_level as building_property_level,
pb.building_area_sqft as building_area_in_square_feet,
pb.building_visual_score as building_spotlight_index,
pb.building_accumulated_risk_tree_coverage as building_aggregate_tree_score,
pb.building_tree_count as building_number_of_dangerous_trees,
pb.create_date as building_create_date,
pb.update_date as building_update_date
from
(
select
*
from
(
select
property_version_id,
external_id,
order_date,
completion_date,
latest_image_capture_date,
overall_visual_score,
update_date,
property_version_number,
property_street,
property_city,
property_state,
property_zip,
property_status,
row_number() over(partition by external_id
order by
latest_image_capture_date desc nulls last,
completion_date desc nulls last,
update_date desc nulls last) as rn
from
dbo.betterview_property_stg )
where
rn = 1 ) p
left join (
select
*
from
(
select
property_level,
building_number,
property_version_id,
property_building_id,
building_tree_count,
building_visual_score,
building_accumulated_risk_tree_coverage,
building_area_sqft,
create_date,
update_date,
row_number() over (partition by property_level,
building_number,
property_version_id
order by
create_date desc nulls last) as rn
from
dbo.betterview_property_building_stg
where
property_level = 'Building'
and building_number = 1 )
where
rn = 1 )pb on
p.property_version_id = pb.property_version_id ) bvp;

uiProperties.default:
detail.cmm_container = master.straight_through_processing_data_staging_type
and detail.system_id = master.policy_source_system_id
and detail.parent_id = master.policy_parent_id
